Blog.post: tonite was so boaring. and i did nothing at all, all b/c i dont have a car yet! once i do ill be gone everywhere all the time! but lets see what did i do......i woke up, my dad brought me lunch from panera! mmmmmmm! soup bowl. and then i did nothing for a while, and got yelled at for being online.then i went to the pool store with my dad, woo hoo tuns of fun! came home waited for christine to get off of work so she could come over, but turns out she couldnt spend the nite, so everybody was at maggies doing absolutly nothing. but before i had asked everyone if they wanted to come over to my house and go swimming and i had a big bonfire, so it was gunna be hella tyte, but nobody wanted to, so i was like whatever as* holes, but like i dunno it just makes me mad that nobody wants to hang out with me b/c of what happened betweeen me and my ex bf, things should stay between us and if it doesnt concern them then back off! but i was talking to my friend alex again, and he said that i should make a move on scott soon, and he said try asking him out and just being romantic w/ him, and i will. cuz i honestly think that we were ment for eachother, if we werent then how come i have stuck around him so long! well im gunna go so i will talk to yall later! -goodnite-

well tonite was kewl, when christine came over. i miss her so much. but tonite i went and got my ben and jerry's cookie dough ice cream, and i watched my movies with christine. and thats what i always do when im depressed, only this time it helped! so i called scott at 9:30 and thats when he just walked in the door from work, and he was like im going to a grad. party so ill call you later, i was like you promise, and he said yeah. sure enough he called me back at like 1am. and we talked for like 45 min. only cuz he was hella tired and had football all day tomorrow! but we got to talking about the online thing, and he said the only reason he hasnt called me is b/c he thought i was mad at him and plus hes been working like crazy. and we cleared things up between us, and hes not mad at me and were good, although he said he was joking about some things that i didnt think were funny, so i dunno if he was joking or not. but i trust him enough.OMG!!! when i was on the phone w/ scott at like 1:30, my bed shook, and so did scotts house, and my friend ed's house, there was an earthquake and on the rickter scale it was at 4.5 out of 10 and 8 is considered to be serious damage! so that was freaky! well im gunna go to bed, just wanted you to know life is good again! ~goodnite~

Tonite was bad too. i was talking to my friend alex whos friends with scott, and scott was going over to his house to hang out, and i called his house and told his lil brother to tell him i called when he got off of work. and he never called me.but i went shopping w/ my mom and grandma(they buy me shit, so i said why not lol) and so i put my away message up when i left and i guess my dad clicked out of my away message and so scott though i was online you know, and he was like oh are we not talking to me now, so i asked my friend alex what was up with him, and he was like yeah i guess scott is mad at you cuz you didnt talk to him and you were ignoring him. and so if hes mad at me for that, hes got another thing coming to him, he hasnt called me in like 4 days. after messing around w/ me, what kind of message do you think that sends out?..exactly a one nite stand, and i know he wouldnt do that to me. so i dunno. i just really hope this isnt a big joke that hes playing. you know whats its like to have no one like you? and at the same time thinking someone is playing a joke on you, think of it as if someone were dumping you but at the same time you were getting stabed. yeah the fix of the 2 sux's! and scott, if your reading this call me. im not mad at you and i really wish you would let me know whats going on between us! ~good nite~ i hope my day is great tomorrow! *wish me tons of luck*

Tonite was the worst nite ever.I was so scared! but it is my own fault. I called this guy who i have never met to hang out, i was bored and my mom was getting home at like 11 ish, so i wanted to go out as my last nite of freedom, so called this guy up who lived in west chicago, omg what was i thinking! and we went to his work place and he liked me and i just wanted to hang out cuz i like scott, but i was bored cuz scott couldnt go out tonite. so when we got to his work(he owned the place) i felt so uncomfortable. I honestly thought that i was gunna get raped, and i just anted to get outta ther SO bad! i wanted Scott SOOO bad! and i never went near him, and he kept getting mad at me for me not hitting on him, and i wouldnt! and so i asked him to drive me to my friends house who lived like a block away form me, so the only way i could get him to take me there was to sit by him. and i did but then he was like your being rude and shit and i was so scared. when he droped me off at my friends house there was some of my other friends like carolyn,ellie,astra and christine(her house) and 2 guys wich carolyn and christine worked with and we were just hangin out and having fun, i had to be home at 11....yeah, didnt make it. lol i got home at 12:10 ish and my mom was like why didnt you call, and its kewl i talked my way out of it! and when i got home i was so scared, cuz some other person was smoking and i didnt want my mom to think i was. but its all gravy baby! cuz i used her tooth brush cuz i had taken a puff, cuz i had never tried it b4 and so my breath smelt. And one of the guys asked for my number and i was like uhh, sure why? i was like i like someone though and he was all like thats ok and used my phone. but hey its kewl im home now. darn! but ill never talk to that kid i never met again! Plus he was ugly as fuck, and fat and smelly. lol thats why i like scott, hes ABSOLUTLY none of those, hes HOTT!, with 2 t's lol, nice ass body! and always smells good! but bad news i didnt get to see scot at all today, and he probably wont call me tonite. I know why too probably. cuz when he droped me off, he didnt get home till like 11:20, meaning he was 20 min late, i feel SOO bad! but its kewl, once he gets over to his dads house i can come over whenever i want, cuz his dad likes me!! ~goodnite~

Tonite was probably the best nite of the week.Today was ok, i cleaned the pool and then went out to dinner with my g-ma, ken(her friend) and ken's daughter(shes like 40) and then i was gunna go hang out w/ Scott(this is where my nite got good) and he called me when we were at dinner saying that he didnt have a baseball game anymore so we could hang ou tat his house. So he picked me up at like 8:30, so we got to his house at 9 ish, but you see there is a down side, he had to be home at 11, meaning we had to leave at 10:15. And i didnt care how long i got to see him for, all that mattered is that i got to see him, and boy was he HOTT! with 2 t's lol and i asked him if i was cute, he gave me a 15 out of 10 lol i thought that was cute... im no to one to kiss and tell, so i wont!(thats all im saying hehe) i kinda mat his stepdad, i sw him for like a split second when i was leaving, cuz we were in the basement, and his stepdad was upstairs when we came in. And i was like i dont want tonite to be the only nite i see you and then have you get mad at me cuz all you wanted was action or whatever, and he said i know, thats why im having you over tomorrow during the day to go swimming! i was like awwww lol but thats about it. DAM i just realized that my mom gets back tomorrow. damit! i LOVE not having my parents around, thats why i liked being in Vegas w/ out them and also why i wanted to stay longer. Who honestly wants to be around their parents everyday, not me thats for sure, its nice to take a break away from them, try it!! but anywho! lol im gunna go upstairs and try to sneak out and go do something, its so boaring here and my g-ma is in bed and its only like 11:30 so ill ttyl ~good nite~

Today is just like yesterday. You know how i was hoping to see Scott today..guess what? uh uh didnt happen. he got in a lot of trouble with his mom and he cant do anything, so the latest i would get to see him would be the weekend. Which sucks b/c i want to hang out when my parents arent home. I like having freedom. So i have done nothing all day i went to bed at 8 am and woke up at 3pm and since then done nothing! and i miss britt so much! right now we'd be out and having fun with hot guys lol well so far i was right about glen ellyn, its boaring and i knew once i got back from Vegas i wouldnt have any fun at all, if only i could predict when i could see Scott again. That would be tyte! So last night i was talking to my "friend" jamie and he was telling me how he was mad at me for what happened between me and my ex. And he was just making me so mad that i wanted to kill myself, and i tried to last night, but it didnt work cuz i loved my sister too much! and i wanted to see scott, and all this stuff. i cnt wait till im 18, im moving out after my senior year to cali! and im living with Britt, my best friend in the world! were like sisters, and shes the only one i have felt that close to. Shes like family to me, ive known her since i was 2. and when i left her saturday the 20th, it was honestly very hard for me. i cnt get over it, i miss her so much, and just being around her has made me want to be more like her, shes my idol, that may sound wierd, but i have changed since i got back form Vegas, ive become a better person, someone more like...Britt! well ill write more later but for now i think im gunna go find something to do! <3 always ~Jen~

Well today is starting off good, i woke up at 3 though, but its all good. Well the reason its starting off good, is b/c im talking to Scott, to start your day off talking to the one you like is the best feeling in the world! The only reason he didnt call me was b/c he got in trouble, and i believe him completly, things are starting to turn around. But i still miss hanging out with him, and all im hoping for is that things between me and him will happen. Do you know what its like to have liked someone for a long time and not have them like you back? maybe you do, but for me its happened too many times and im just hoping and wishing that it never happens again! My grandma just got here! woohoo, time for the party to never start! im so mad that shes staying, im happy to see her but like at the same time im not, only b/c i want to be on my own, who doesnt! but im glade shes here, b/c she prob. wont be living much longer, because she has parkinsins disease. So if i lost her i dont know what id do. and if things didnt work between me and scott, i dont know what i'll do. Well i dont have much to say anymore, so ill wrote more tonight. and ill let you know if me and scott hang out, we betta lol <3 always ~Jen~

today was ok, not as i would have wanted it to be, but me and my sister hung out and that was hella kewl, cuz me and my sister get along sometimes, but i barly see her, so we just went out to her friend pats house and watched movies. my sister fell asleep and so did pat, so i was just kinda up by myself watching gladiator and music video's.sounds fun huh? well then i woke my sister up at like 4:30, and we didnt get home till like 5 ish and ive been up ever since and its now...7:30 am and im actually not that tired, just really bored. So im so confused right now, part of the reason i havent been sleeping much. its manly b/c of this dilema with this guy Scott. I like him a lot, but you see he kinda screwed up a lot! and now i kinda cant trust him that much. were friends again and all, abd he says he likes me a lot too, and that im beautiful and all this stuff, but i dont know if i should believe him anymore. he could be just playing another joke on me, like hes done a lot in the past, and i hope hes not, cuz i dont want to have to go threw all that emotion again. and im just waiting for him to really show that he cares about me like he says he does. so i realy dont know what to believe. Ive liked this kid for 2 years and not once, until now does he say he likes me, so i hope it turns out for the best!

tonite started off good. when my dad got home he brougt home the plates for my car, but there were no screws, so we went to the tire store and we got the spare tire put on my bad tire. and we went home and i put the plates on with the screws we bought. and while we were in the tire store, scott called me and wanted to know if i wanted to come over swimming, i was like HELL YEAH! lol and so i was going to. he told me hed call after they were done eating dinner. it got to be that they were eating dinner for like 2 hrs, so i called and he said his step-dad said that no one could come over, i guess he was in a bad mood, so i didnt go there :( but then i was tlaking to my friend brett and his bro was kicking him out of his house cuz his bro was having a party. so he was gunna come here, but his mom wouldnt let him, so i called my friend steve and him and mike came over, it was fun, i hadnt seem either of them in like 5 months. they went home at like 11:30. then when i got online i was talking to this guy joe who we talked about hanging out cuz we kinda liked eachother. and he basicly told me that ne never really liked me and i wasnt hot, but my best friend was and he would love to see her in a bikini and not me. she is pretty, but i didnt think i wasnt. oh well carolyn is pretty! oh well im useto guys just "using" me i just wish that any guy that likes me would come up and tell me, and why if there brave enough. lol but my nite was boaring kinda. so i think im getting my lisence tomorrow oh yeah! FINALLY!! we'll see (knock on wood) ne who i dont have much to say except that i cant wait till cheerleading camp! its gunna be fun, and workcamp! but tomorrow should be fun! i have cheerleading at 12:30 till like 1:30 ish and then carolyn and astra are picking me up to go to rice poolto visit ellie!(which is were joe works) but from ten on who knows what will happen. and saturday is gunna be TONS! of fun, cuz im having ppl over to go nite swimming and bonfire and stuff, so far all i know is that scott is going, and oh i forgot grahams b-day is tomorrow at 8! its gunna be hella fun! well this is where i get off. so good nite ya'll! *MUAHZ* *~Jen~*

wow! i havent written in a while,kinda. well to fill you in, not that much happened. well riday,, i dont remember what happened on friday. lol but saturday i went to a hotel for 4th of july, thats why i havent written much. but so on saturday me, my mom and my dad met up with my aunt and g-ma, along with my aunts friends Terri, terris 4 kids 1 girl and 3 boys!(victoria-11,Alex-gunna be a 8th grader,Christian-gunna be a freshy,Connor-16) but all the boys looked like they were MUCH older!. me and they guys and vic. hung out much of the time and me and connor just hung out and talked about sports and just got to know eachother. And OMG we went to dinner on sat. and it was this bohemian place(duck,stuff like that) and alex and chris are so fuckin funny! they cracked me up the whole nite! and they were ,making fun of the waiter cuz he had this wierd accent and they were making fun of the food! they got soup and they HATED it so they were like, can you pass the water, i mean..soup! lol omg it was funny, you had to be there. and then when we got back we went nite swimming!, me connor christian,alex and victoria. and it got to cold so me and connor went in the hot tub, and it was so warm! felt good. but then some lady kicked us out cuz it was past 10 wich is when the pool closes. so we got out and went into the outside pool and had fun, we stayed in there for like an hour, it was so much fun! so we got out at like 11, and then went back up to their room and hung out. then we ordered food and we "fed" eachother, we had a food fite. and that was fun i put food down connors pants! and he got me back by rubbing pizza all over me! it was nasty and i got Chris back by poaring soda on him and he pored soda over me too! omg it was so much fun! and so since we were all dirty we went back to the outside pool and hopped the fence and dove in in our close except some of the guys went in nude! lol omg it was so wrong so i wated outside for a lil bit till they put there shorts back on! and then we all slepted in there room and just went to bed where ever we could find a spot. and then sunda we hung around the pool and me and connor went back into the hot tub and talked again, hes a really nice guy and hes so sweet! hes just a really fun guy to talk to. And then we were watching the cubs vs sux game in the bar/game room and wme and the guys and there moms boyfriend and just a couple more adult friends and HELL YEAH THE CUBS WON!!! WE SWEEPED THE SUX!! then after the game me and Connor went outside and watched fire works on the grass. we couldnt find anybody so we just sat there by ourselves, again talking! lol and then after thoe were done we went and hung out with the drunk adults and omg there was some funny ones, we were hangin out for like an hour and then me and Connor and nick(his moms boyfriend) went upstairs to their room, cuz nick was sooo plastered! lol hes so funny when hes drunk omg is he funny! and so nick passed out and alex,vic. and terri were asleep and chris was up for a lil bit and we were watching sports center and then when chris fell asleep me and connor were talking again lol!and i went back to my aunts rrom at like 1:30 and i fell asleep in my g-mas bed.Next moarning i woke up and everybody was gone and out by the pool and so i got ready and went down too. and terri and her kids were gunna come down but they left, or so we think so we went home, and thats my past 3 days! ~love always Jen!~

well today was hella kewl! i went to the taste of chicago with my sister, and we took the train, cuz we werent about to pay for parking downtown! so we got there at like 4:30 and left at like...7 ish hjer friend ben was ther with us for a lil bit. But when i got home i was gunna go to lombard fest with alex, maggie,kristie,ellie,christine,carolyn,bethany, so i met up with them. Monica let me drive her trucj there, cuz she said i had to get usto her truck cuz i was gunna have to drive her places. hell yeah! so i got to lombard fest and met up with them, only to be leaving 5 min. later so we walked back to their cars and went to mcdonalds(major eue!!) and hung out there for a lil bit till ppl had to leave. and omg a bunch of soccer guys came in like the whole team! i almost died, they were so georgus!!! and they all were lookin at me, and hey i cant blame them! lol but then i came home it was a fun day, but i didnt get any numbers lol, oh well... I DONT NEED EM! lol well i really dont have anything left to say except that my grandma really wants to sell the car that she gave me cuz she said i was being ungrateful, whatev i so was not even close to that, i love the car, i just dont like how you have to get the key out. but ne ways, ill talk to you later. nite nite! love always and forever! ~Jen~

well today was o k, we went to the dmv and got the papers for my lisence plates and stuff, and then went to lunch...eue i hate eating during the day. but then when i got home i told my dad that i didnt like the way i hade to get the key out of the ignition from my car. and i said it was abnormal or something, and he flipped and was like well then if you dont like the car then go get a new one, and your attitude is abnormal. so i got mad and stuff and like later that nite i see a for sale sign on my car, i was like why is there a for sale sign on my car, and my dad said well since you dont like it so much you dont have to have it, and all i said was i didn tlike the way i had to get the key out, not that i didnt like the car, way to over egzagerate huh!?heyhes old, you cant expect much from him now can ya! oh well but then i went swimming, and then later my friend nicole came over and then we met up with some friends at oberweise and just hung out and drove around. not too exciting of a nite now is it! oh well beats sitting at home doing nothing again. but then i was talking to scott... and i dunno i just like him a lot that i cant wait to get my car so things between us can work finally! so i better be getting my lisence soon! ill borrow a dam car if i have to i dont care, im making things work any way i can! but hey i cant wait to drive and get away whenever i want! hell yeah baby! lol well im gunna go, and i might be a model i forgot to tell you, for roxy no less! oh yeah thats right! long story! but whatev......ill talk to yall later! goodnite, sweet dreams, keep them dry! lol(scott, you know what im talking about, mr pool cover lol!) love always and forever!! ~Jen~

Wow i havent writtin in a looong time... but a lot has happened! well i went to oklahoma for a church retreat, just like every year. but this year was more emotional and changing for me and it really made me thing about who i want to be and why i am the way i am. Basicly, ive realized that i have to start my whole life over, finding a new group of friends and change how i am. its hard ive lost all of my friends basicly they all have there own little groups and they never want to include me. i call them leave them a million messages but no one ever wants to do anything with me. and all the guys out here, dont like me or there just using me. i dunno when i went to oklahoma i met these 2 guys that live in sullivan, and they both like me but sullivan is 3 hours away so its kinda hard to have a relationship. you know what i mean. but i really hate my life, like i dunno it just sucks to know that you have to start your life over. but i dunno, i just cant wait to move to cali. and live with Britt, i love you britt! your like a sister to me. me and my friend sarah got close though. and shes so easy to talk to, and me and her are going threw the same thing. were both trying to find ourselves and be happy with ourselves and out lives. and i know some ppl that are pretty fake and shady. i wont name names, but heres the story... i liked this guy named eric for a while and my friend tells me to make moves on him all the time. and rite b4 i went to vegas i sent him a letter telling him how i felt, he never told me, and when we were in oklahoma i talked to him and he said he didnt want a gf. now my friend said she doesnt like him. but on the way home tell me why she was laying on him for like an hour. she says its cuz there was no where else to lay, why not lay the other way DUH! so whatever i hate fake ppl. especially when there your best friend. but then i went to cheer camp and i made a lot of new friends, and i saw better different sides of ppl that i never knew before. but i just wish i was pretty and i wish guys i liked didnt live so far away or werent attracted to me. i just wish my life was over. its caused me nothing but depression and unhappiness. i just want to feel good about myself.
